column1: # SOURCE: FAO Irrigation and Drainage Paper No. 33 (Doorenbos & Kassam
# DESCRIPTION: FAO yield response factors (Ky) for water stress calculations
# UNITS: ky_whole_season (dimensionless) — yield sensitivity to water deficit
#   Ky > 1.0 = yield drops more than proportionally to water deficit (sensitive)
#   Ky < 1.0 = yield drops less than proportionally (tolerant)
#   wue_curvature (beta) controls concavity; default 3.5 from Daryanto et al. (2021) meta-analysis
#   - Whole-season Ky values; per-growth-stage values available in FAO Paper 33 Table 12
#   - Kale uses cabbage (Brassica oleracea var. capitata) as proxy — same species
#   - Cucumber not in FAO Paper 33; value from open-field irrigation study consensus (Ky=0.96-1.02)
